text: @Mike_Pence U just attended event in Dallas  where you wore a mask,but choir & most of 3000 in attendance didn't wear masks, nor practice social distancing. You're head of  "coronavirus task force" shouldn't u lead by example & not attend events that jeopardizes health & safety of Americans.
